attributes.action: All religion to stop being recognised by society
attributes.additional_details: To reduce the legitimacy and influence of religion in society by calling it’s precedence  to an end. This isn’t to oppress or persecute those with religious beliefs, it would simply mean that if they wish to believe in a magic man in the sky, it won't be recognised in culture. If you said ‘Elvis lives’, in a job interview, you'd lose favour. The same doesn’t apply to religion because it is given a disproportionate amount of respect. Sign this if you wish to make faith in society negligible.
